verses.text: “\w Yes|strong="H3651"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* days \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w restore|strong="H2492"\w* Judah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem \w from|strong="H5921"\w* captivity,

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* gather \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w and|strong="H3117"\w* bring \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jehoshaphat. \w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* enter \w into|strong="H5921"\w* judgment \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w*, \w My|strong="H5921"\w* inheritance, Israel, \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* scattered \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* divided \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* land.

\w They|strong="H5414"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* lots \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1818"\w*; \w they|strong="H5414"\w* bartered \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boy \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prostitute \w and|strong="H8064"\w* sold \w a|strong="H3068"\w* girl \w for|strong="H5414"\w* wine \w to|strong="H5414"\w* drink.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w what|strong="H3372"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Tyre, Sidon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* regions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Philistia? \w Are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* rendering \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* recompense? If \w you|strong="H6440"\w* retaliate \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* swiftly \w and|strong="H3068"\w* speedily return \w your|strong="H3068"\w* recompense \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heads.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* silver \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gold \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H3068"\w* off \w My|strong="H3605"\w* finest treasures \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* temples.
You sold the people of Judah and Jerusalem to the Greeks, to send them far from their homeland.
Behold, I will rouse them from the places to which you sold them; I will return your recompense upon your heads.

I will sell your sons and daughters into the hands of the people of Judah, and they will sell them to the Sabeans—to \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distant nation.” Indeed, the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* has spoken.
Proclaim this among the nations: “Prepare for war; rouse the mighty men; let all the men of war advance and attack!
Beat your plowshares into swords and your pruning hooks into spears. Let the weak say, ‘I am strong!’
Come quickly, all you surrounding nations, and gather yourselves. Bring down Your mighty ones, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
Let the nations be roused and advance to the Valley of Jehoshaphat, for there I will sit down to judge all the nations on every side.
Swing the sickle, for the harvest is ripe. Come, trample the grapes, for the winepress is full; the wine vats overflow because their wickedness is great.
Multitudes, multitudes in the valley of decision! For the Day of the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* is near in the valley of decision.
The sun and moon will grow dark, and the stars will no longer shine.

The \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will roar from Zion and raise His voice from Jerusalem; heaven and earth will tremble. But the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will be \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge for His people, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stronghold for the people of Israel.
Then you will know that I am the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* your God, who dwells in Zion, My holy mountain. Jerusalem will be holy, never again to be overrun by foreigners.

And in that day the mountains will drip with sweet wine, and the hills will flow with milk. All the streams of Judah will run with water, and \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spring will flow from the house of the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* to water the Valley of Acacias.
Egypt will become desolate, and Edom \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desert wasteland, because of the violence done to the people of Judah, in whose land they shed innocent blood.
But Judah will be inhabited forever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
For I will avenge their blood, which I have not yet avenged.” For the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* dwells in Zion.
